caption: Possibly Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri) (1591–1666, born Cento, Italy; died Bologna, Italy), St. John the Baptist in Prison, Visited by Salomé. Pen, brown ink and iron gall ink with brown wash; 20.5 x 25.6 cm. Gift of Nathan V. Hammer (x1959-36)
